medium: Pen and black ink, gray wash and brush and brown ink on laid paper
provenance: Dr. Richard P. Wunder (1923-2002), New York and La Jolla, California (until 1976; his sale, Christie's, London, July 7, 1976, no. 70, for £95, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1976-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Elevation and Ground Plan of Altar Dedicated to Female Martyr (recto); Fragment of Architectural Design (verso)
